name: TICKDOWN
description:
In exactly two hours, I will detonate a weapon of mass destruction.

I am destined to succeed. I already know that nothing you do can stop me, but I want to see you fail firsthand.

What you can expect


  • I shall grant you the elemental powers of Water, Earth, Fire, and Air

  • I shall grant you the power to combine your abilities together to create even stronger ones

  • I shall grant you the power to heal by killing my minions or by absorbing their incoming attacks
  • I shall grant you the power to move freely in any direction

With those upgrades, you might even stand a chance against my hordes of relentless minions... if you constantly keep moving.

There's a chance you might even find some unlikely allies around you.


But along the way, I will shatter more than just your hopes of emerging victorious.

I will shatter the very illusions that you refer to as reality.

A trigger warning for the easily offended: if you can't tell the difference between satire and reality, then don't read anything you find lying around.

====

Photosensitive content warning: TICKDOWN may not be suitable for those who may experience seizures when exposed to certain or intense visuals
